name: A Man Of Few Words
description: Darvo needs your help again. Save one of his best contractors from Grineer execution.

name: Apostasy Prologue
description: Inspect your personal quarters upon finishing the Chains of Harrow quest.

name: Chains Of Harrow
description: A strange transmission leads deep into the dark world of Red Veil mysticism. What evils will be found there and what do they want?

name: Chimera Prologue
description: Investigate your personal quarters upon completion of The Sacrifice.

name: Hidden Messages
description: Seek out the Warframe Mirage

components.name: Argon Crystal
components.description: A Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the Void.This resource can be found in the Void.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Seek out the Warframe Mirage

components.name: Orokin Cipher
components.description: This device is used to bypass Orokin encryptions.Location: Orokin Derelict Vaults

components.name: Oxium
components.description: Oxium is a rare lighter than air alloy of Orokin origin, used in certain Corpus Robotics.Locations: Venus, Jupiter, Mars, Neptune, Pluto, Eris, Europa, and Lua.

name: Howl Of The Kubrow
description: You are Tenno, you deserve a Kubrow by your side.

name: Jordas Golem Assassinate
description: Access this assassination mission by completing the Jordas Precept quest.

name: Mask Of The Revenant
description: The Unum chooses Nakak to receive a strange mask. A mask that leads to even stranger visions. What lost story does the Unum want to tell?

name: Mutalist Alad V Assassinate
description: Put an end to Alad V and his Mutalist experiments

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Put an end to Alad V and his Mutalist experiments

components.name: Ferrite
components.description: Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.Locations: Mercury, Earth, Lua, Neptune, and the Void.

components.name: Mutalist Alad V Nav Coordinate
components.description: These coordinates can be used to track Mutalist Alad V.Can be acquired from Infestation Outbreaks & Orokin Derelicts.

components.name: Nano Spores
components.description: Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.Locations: Saturn, Neptune, Eris, and Orokin Derelicts.

components.name: Nav Coordinate
components.description: Coordinate used to locate lost ships.Can be acquired from Storage Containers.

name: Natah
description: Strange drones have appeared in the Origin System, help the Lotus find out what they are and who sent them.

name: Octavia'S Anthem
description: Build the Mandachord and find the cause of Cephalon Suda’s erratic behavior.

name: Once Awake
description: Intercepted Grineer communications reveal that Grineer have been experimenting with some sort of bio weapon. You must investigate.

name: Patient Zero
description: Find Alad V’s laboratory and put a stop to his madness

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Find Alad V’s laboratory and put a stop to his madness

components.name: Nano Spores
components.description: Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.Locations: Saturn, Neptune, Eris, and Orokin Derelicts.

components.name: Neurodes
components.description: Biotech sensor organ harvested from Infested entities.Locations: Earth, Lua, Eris, and Orokin Derelicts.

components.name: Plastids
components.description: A disgusting nanite-infested tissue mass.Locations: Phobos, Saturn, Uranus, Pluto, and Eris.

name: Sands Of Inaros
description: Help Baro Ki'Teer raid an ancient Martian tomb for a mysterious treasure.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Help Baro Ki'Teer raid an ancient Martian tomb for a mysterious treasure.

components.name: Nano Spores
components.description: Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.Locations: Saturn, Neptune, Eris, and Orokin Derelicts.

components.name: Nitain Extract
components.description: Each vial is produced by the painstaking expression of billions of rare, ocean-vent dwelling microorganisms.This resource can be acquired from Nightwave offerings.

components.name: Oxium
components.description: Oxium is a rare lighter than air alloy of Orokin origin, used in certain Corpus Robotics.Locations: Venus, Jupiter, Mars, Neptune, Pluto, Eris, Europa, and Lua.

name: Saya'S Vigil
description: On the Plains of Eidolon a mystery has lain buried for years: one that will mend or destroy a heart, and open the door to a hidden past.

name: Stolen Dreams
description: Find the thief Maroo and uncover the secrets of the Arcane Codices.

name: The Archwing
description: The Balor Fomorians are coming but we are ready. Through your efforts we finally have a working Archwing prototype and I am sending you the blueprint. However, your task is not yet complete. You still must discover the component parts.

name: The Glast Gambit
description: Nef Anyo has stolen the children of the Mycona Colony and it is up to you to get them back. You must challenge Nef on The Index and beat him at his own game. But Tenno, beware, not all is as it seems.

name: The Jordas Precept
description: Ordis is determined to help a fellow Cephalon overcome a ship wide infestation.

name: The Limbo Theorem
description: The Limbo Theorem quest cannot be completed without an ArchwingPiece together the Limbo Theorem to uncover its source

components.name: Argon Crystal
components.description: A Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the Void.This resource can be found in the Void.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: The Limbo Theorem quest cannot be completed without an ArchwingPiece together the Limbo Theorem to uncover its source

components.name: Neural Sensors
components.description: Implanted neural-link for controlling augmentations. Grineer design.Location: Jupiter.

components.name: Orokin Cell
components.description: Ancient energy cell from the Orokin era.Locations: Ceres, Saturn, and Orokin Derelicts.

name: The New Strange
description: Work with Cephalon Simaris to find the source of a mysterious voice.

name: The Sacrifice
description: A tortured vision sends the Operator on the hunt for a Warframe unlike any other.

name: The Second Dream
description: The Sentient Hunhow seeks to destroy the Tenno by exploiting long forgotten secrets.

name: The Silver Grove
description: New Loka seeks help protecting a sacred forest from Grineer incursions, but are they ready to face the forest’s true nature?

name: The War Within
description: A disturbance in the Somatic Link prompts the Lotus to send operatives back to the Tenno Reservoir.

name: Vor'S Prize
description: MY QUEENS -You were right, the Tenno threat is real. We found one drifting near Pluto but the Lotus knew we were coming. She purged the Cryo moments before we had them and sent a squad of Tenno to break our assault.They escaped. We are working on tracing them. Separate this Tenno from the flock and it should be easy to kill. We shattered its Warframe and expect such an abrupt Cryo purge will have damaged its memories.We anxiously await punishment for failing this task.- VOR

name: Vox Solaris
description: Eudico would do anything to keep her people safe, but will she stand up to Nef Anyo?
